definition.name: entropy
definition.definition: Von Neumann entropy: S(rho) := -Tr[rho log rho] (natural log, 0 log 0 := 0). Conditional entropy: H(A|B)_rho := S(rho_AB) - S(rho_B). Relative entropy (Umegaki): D(rho||sigma) := Tr[rho(log rho - log sigma)] when supp(rho) ⊆ supp(sigma), else +∞. Binary entropy: h_2(eps) := -eps log eps - (1-eps) log(1-eps). Key identity CE-RE: H(A|B)_rho = -D(rho_AB || 1_A ⊗ rho_B).
